definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: He's the sheriff at Twin Gulch, Idaho, and I'm his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 他是愛達荷州特溫加爾奇的治安官，我是他的副手。

sentences.english: It wasn't impossible even though it was a long way from the Snake River Vally in Idaho.
sentences.chinese: 但它遠在愛達荷州的蛇河谷卻也並非不可能。

sentences.english: Located in southwestern Idaho, Boise is the city with the small town feel.
sentences.chinese: 位於愛達荷州西南部，是博伊西市的小城市的感覺。

sentences.english: She was recently released in a forest in Idaho.
sentences.chinese: 它最近被野放回愛達荷州的森林。

sentences.english: LL: I have an uncle who owns a farm in Idaho.
sentences.chinese: 我還不知道你有個叔叔在愛達荷州。

sentences.english: He was from a small town in Idaho and farmed with his father.
sentences.chinese: 他愛達荷州的一個小鎮，和他父親一起經營農場。

sentences.english: In 1885 , poet ezra pound was born in hailey , idaho.
sentences.chinese: 1885年，詩人以期拉龐德出生在愛達荷州。

sentences.english: It was built in the state of Idaho about six kilometers away from the city of Orofino.
sentences.chinese: 它位於愛達荷州，距離奧羅菲洛市約6公里。
